name: Jump The Island
description:
How to play:

Use WASD to move around and use Space to jump

Alternate controls: Arrow keys

Move your character around jumping from island to island. Collect the most coins you can before the timer runs out! Beware of fireballs and the dangerous water...

I made this game for fun as a side project to mess around with. I got an online leaderboard working so I wanted to release it to the public so that we can all have fun.

Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
